# Specific Shields
## Lesser Minor Shield
**Lesser Minor Shield**


| **d%** | **LESSER MINOR SHIELD** | **PRICE** | **SOURCE** |
|---|---|---|---|
| 01–20 | Living steel heavy shield | 120 gp | Ultimate Equipment 132 |
| 21–45 | Darkwood buckler | 203 gp | Core Rulebook 466, Ultimate Equipment 131 |
| 46–70 | Darkwood shield | 257 gp | Core Rulebook 466, Ultimate Equipment 131 |
| 71–100 | [[Mithral Heavy Shield\|Mithral heavy shield]] | 1,020 gp | Core Rulebook 466, Ultimate Equipment 132 |
